engine._DESCRIPTION: Specify which synchronisation method to use

oc_admin_user._DESCRIPTION: Specify the admin user of the ownCloud installation

oc_admin_password._DESCRIPTION: Specify the admin password of the ownCloud installation

monitoring_push._DESCRIPTION: Specify the name of your database

monitoring_type._DESCRIPTION: Specify the type of your database

monitoring_host._DESCRIPTION: Specify the ip address of the database

monitoring_user._DESCRIPTION: Specify user for the access to the database

monitoring_password._DESCRIPTION: Specify password for the access to the database

monitoring_type._DESCRIPTION: Specify type of the database used [currently influxdb or graphite]

oc_server._DESCRIPTION: Specify the ip address of target server

server_name._DESCRIPTION: Give the alias for you server. Do not use DOTS in case of graphite database!

oc_ssl_enabled._DESCRIPTION: Specify if server uses ssl for connections

oc_webdav_endpoint._DESCRIPTION: [default] Specify the path to webdav for your server

oc_account_password._DESCRIPTION: Specify what password should have your automaticaly created test account

oc_sync_cmd._DESCRIPTION: Specify sync binary for your client

runid._DESCRIPTION: Specify the identification for the test. Do not use DOTS in case of graphite database! Could be also set using json-config-daily-update script (documentation in github repository)

oc_account_reset_procedure._DESCRIPTION: [default] Specify the method of user creation/deletion

oc_number_test_users._DESCRIPTION: [default for the test_gen_nplusone.py] Specify the number of users in this test
